ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | submgmss.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | #P_submgmrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> M e. Mgm ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( M |`s S ) = ( M |`s S ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_issubmgm2 | |- ( M e. Mgm -> ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ ( M |`s S ) e. Mgm ) ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ ( M |`s S ) e. Mgm ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ibi | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> ( S C_ B /\ ( M |`s S ) e. Mgm ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simpld | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> S C_ B ) |
